snippet: Phil Mickelson was three shots behind the leaders after shooting a bogey-free four-under-par 68 in the opening round of the Houston Open, showing no effects of the muscle pull that forced him to withdraw from last week’s Texas Open.
abstract: Phil Mickelson is three shots behind leaders after shooting a bogey-free four-under-par in opening round of Houston Open, showing no effects of muscle pull that forced him to withdraw from Texas Open a week earlier.
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson was three shots behind the leaders after shooting a bogey-free four-under-par 68 in the opening round of the Houston Open, showing no effects of the muscle pull that forced him to withdraw from last week’s Texas Open.
